From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>

* Not a breath this carnavore dared to breath as it stalked towards the two 
fighting reptiles, every step calculated and calculated over again. Failure 
was not an option!
It was large but easily hidden in the early morning shadows but it's grey 
and black hide, it's massive head close to the ground and it's tail half in 
the air for balance.
As it crept a few steppes closer it could smell a tinge of something in the 
air, it closely resembled the smell of blood but had an acrid odder to it, 
little did the predator know but that was the smell of mech-fluid.
It stalked closer then stopped, it's sighted prey only a 12 feet away and it 
tensed it's muscles.
Standing 10:2 at full height it hid itself the best it could, but soon it 
would have to hide no longer!*
